fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
BarnBridge DAO is the DAO that is controlled by the $BOND community. It has full control over the protocol and the features that are built into it. 

Find out the DAO specifications in this Medium post: [BarnBridge DAO: Built for the Future.](https://medium.com/barnbridge/barnbridge-dao-built-for-the-future-3735fbd671c5) and check out [BarnBridge Documentation](https://docs.barnbridge.com/governance/barnbridge-dao).
